import sys;

line = sys.stdin.readline();
line = line.strip();
T = int(line);
for i in range(T):
    line = sys.stdin.readline(); #remove line of input
    line = line.strip();

    line = sys.stdin.readline(); #read in pile info
    line = line.strip();
    piles = [int(p) for p in (line.split(" "))];

    count,j = 0,1;
    for p in piles:
        count,j = count + p / j,j+1;
    if count % 2 == 0:
        print("BOB");
    else:
        print("ALICE");
